import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

plt.xlabel("count")
plt.ylabel("countries")

source.5b29d853:
value = store.groupby('year').sum()[['sales','profit']]
value.plot(kind='bar',figsize=(16,5))
plt.title("Sales vs. Profits")
plt.ylabel("In Lakhs")
